attributes.action: Teresa May get on with Brexit or stand down as pm and stop bowing down to the EU
attributes.background: Teresa May the British people voted and it was voted that we leave the EU so stop dragging your feet and bending over for them. Get us out now and stop giving them our money if you can't handle it then step down as pm and put someone with a backbone who will stand up to the corrupt EU the job.

rejection.details:
The resignation of a Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
